known_issues: Version 30 broke admin bootstrap and removed sidebar user info; reverted to v29 base

existing_features.title: Revert all code to Version 29 state, which had working admin bootstrap, sidebar user info (name and 'User' badge), admin table showing first caller as 'Admin' role with 'System Administrator' name, Add Staff form visible for Admin, and footer displaying 'v29'

In AppLayout.tsx sidebar user info section, replace the hardcoded 'User' badge with dynamic role display by calling useGetMyAdminEntry() with enabled: !!identity. If adminEntry exists, display the role from adminEntry (e.g. 'Admin'). If adminEntry is null or undefined (still loading or user is not an admin), fall back to displaying 'User'
Update the version number in the footer from 'v29' to 'v31'
